title: Where do you start 50 years from now, when talking about the year 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will start with the disastrous events of 2020:- Australia bushfireCovid 19Cyclone- odisha, west bengal and maharshtraEarthquakeEconomy crashAmerica vs china vs WHOChina's master planIndia and nepalThese are the major highlights i want to talk about Then comes good things too Reduction of PollutionClean river waterRepair of ozone holePeople learn the importance of money and healthWork from home experienceThese are the main highlights If u like it plz upvote ❤️
